description: Test matrix configuration for DexRx - single source of truth for local and CI testing

node.comment: Node.js versions to test against. Minimum Node.js 20 due to dependencies (react-router-dom@7+ requires >=20.0.0)

rxjs.comment: RxJS versions to test against. ^7.8.0 = latest 7.x

quickMode.comment: Quick mode uses current Node.js with all RxJS versions
